operations.summary: Returns a list of all Password Generator objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: SCIM filter

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies a property value by which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies either ascending or descending alphabetical order

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of the first result to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates the number of results per page

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

responseMessages.message: The requested operation succeeded
The requested operation succeeded and no further information has been provided, such as in the case of a DELETE operation.
The request contents are incorrectly formatted or the request was made for an invalid API version.
The requester cannot be authenticated
The requester does not have the required privileges or another constraint failed, such as attempting to delete an edit-only object.
The requested path does not refer to an existing object or object relation.

The requested operation could not be performed due to the current state of the configuration. For example, an attempt was made to create an object that already exists or an attempt was made to delete an object that is referred to by another object.
The request is such that the Accept header does not indicate that JSON is an acceptable format for a response.
The server encountered an unexpected error.

operations.summary: Add a new Password Generator to the config

parameters.description: Password Generator to add
parameters.name: add-password-generator-request
attributes

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

parameters.name: applyChangeTo

generatorName.description: Name of the new Password Generator

minimumPasswordCharacters.description: The minimum number of characters that generated passwords will be required to have.

extensionClass.description: The fully-qualified name of the Java class providing the logic for the Third Party Password Generator.

passwordFormat.description: Specifies the format to use for the generated password.

dictionaryFile.description: The path to the dictionary file that will be used to obtain the words for use in generated passwords.

passwordCharacterSet.description: Specifies one or more named character sets.

description.description: A description for this Password Generator

scriptClass.description: The fully-qualified name of the Groovy class providing the logic for the Groovy Scripted Password Generator.

scriptArgument.description: The set of arguments used to customize the behavior for the Scripted Password Generator. Each configuration property should be given in the form 'name=value'.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the Password Generator is enabled for use.

minimumPasswordWords.description: The minimum number of words that must be concatenated in the course of generating a password.

extensionArgument.description: The set of arguments used to customize the behavior for the Third Party Password Generator. Each configuration property should be given in the form 'name=value'.

capitalizeWords.description: Indicates whether to capitalize each word used in the generated password.
